rows.label: tlk41200141_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Claudio-san gave me a Gulan
Woodwing textile as a gift.

rows.label: tlk41200141_03_msg0002
rows.name:
He bought it for me, saying he
hoped it would help me remember
my home, even just a little.

rows.label: tlk41200141_03_msg0003
rows.name:
The wing pattern looked just
like the house I lived in in
Gula, and I... I was so happy.

rows.label: tlk41200141_03_msg0004
rows.name:
You know what? I think I'll become
a dressmaker in the future.

rows.label: tlk41200141_03_msg0005
rows.name:
My dream is to pay back the people
here and make everyone happy.
